line_1: His Merit, or his Vice advances.
line_2: Thus merely, as his Fortune chances,
And gives to all new Turns and Chances

line_1: With what Air he first advances,
line_2: Well I know how ROMEO dances,
By sad mistakes, and black mischances,
And on his milk-white courser prances.

line_1: Each after each, as life advances,
line_2: Were truths, — I'm loth to think them trances.

line_1: I'm no man's foe who peace advances;
